subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Curtis Jerrells recorded the fourth triple-double in Baylor history last Monday when he had 17 points, 11 rebounds and 10 assists in a 74-59 win over Hartford.
snippet: Curtis Jerrells recorded the fourth triple-double in Baylor history last Monday when he had 17 points, 11 rebounds and 10 assists in a 74-59 win over Hartford.
